item.title: Report E-2024100346
item.description:
Report E-2024100346

Identified by scraper @ 2024-10-16T09:16:07+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-10-03
  • City: MARIETTA
  • State: GA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: R & L CARRIERS, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 5000
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: On October 3, 2024, one (1) 50-pound bag of UN1823 was torn during unloading and released approximately two (2) pounds of product to the loading dock floor. R+L Carriers retained Cura Emergency Services, LC who dispatched a crew from Hull's Environmental Services (HES) to remediate the impacted site. HES deployed and absorbents and utilized hand tools to remediate the area. All impacted debris was collected and containerized into one (1) 5-gallon bucket for disposal. HES removed the one (1) damaged bag of sodium hydroxide powder and placed it into a 55-gallon drum for disposal.

item.title: Report E-2024100279
item.description:
Report E-2024100279

Identified by scraper @ 2024-10-11T09:22:09+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-09-25
  • City: ELLENWOOD
  • State: GA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: R & L CARRIERS, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 5000
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: On September 25, 2024, one (1) 1-gallon pail of UN3149 was damaged in a load shift and released approximately one (1) gallon of product to the trailer interior. R+L Carriers retained Cura Emergency Services, LC who dispatched a crew from First Call Environmental (FCE) to remediate the impacted site. The crew containerized the damaged pail in one (1) 55-gallon drum for disposal. FCE personnel utilized neutralizers, absorbents, and hand tools to remediate the site. Allimpacted materials were containerized in the same one (1) 55-gallon drum.
